dcterms:description: BraTS19 is a brain tumor segmentation challenge aimed at evaluating state-of-the-art methods for the segmentation of brain tumors in multimodal MRI. The 2019 edition focused on the segmentation of gliomas, an intrinsically heterogeneous brain tumor, using multi-institutional annotated pre-operative MRI scans.
dcterms:title: BraTS19

dcterms:creator: S. Bakas

dcterms:description: BraTS2019 utilizes multi-institutional annotated pre-operative MRI scans for brain tumor segmentation, providing a comprehensive dataset for the evaluation of segmentation algorithms.
dcterms:title: BraTS2019

dcterms:creator: S. Bakas
dcterms:description: BraTS is a brain tumor segmentation challenge that evaluates machine learning algorithms for segmentation, progression assessment, and overall survival prediction in gliomas.
dcterms:title: BraTS
